text: Se balale -- ''tomara tara prati bisbasa sthapana karale ami tomadera anumati debara age'i? Se-i dekhachi tabe tomadera jadubidya sikhiyeche. Kaje'i ami niscaya tomadera hata o tomadera pa ara'aribhabe kete phelaba'i, ara ami abasya'i tomadera sule caraba khejura gachera kande, ara tomara abasya'i janate parabe amadera madhye kara de'oya sasti besi kathora o dirghasthayi.â€™â€™
